name: Scare Tactics (Rocksus)
description:
GMTK 2021 Game Jam Submission - Scare Tactic

Scare Tactic is a an attempt to answer this year's game jam theme: Joined Together.

In this game, we focused on the mechanics of an entity "scaring" another entity to progress forward in the game

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD to Move

R to Restart Level

Space to Go Invisible

Attributions:

Sprite Pack 1 Tap and Fly by Render Knight

Sprite Pack Sunny Land by Ansimuz
